text: Antoine Christophe Merlin (13 September 1762 in Thionville, Moselle â€“ September 1833 in Paris) was a member of several legislative bodies during the era of the French Revolution. He is usually called Merlin de Thionville (Merlin of Thionville) to distinguish him from Philippe-Antoine Merlin de Douai. Category:1762 births Category:1833 deaths Category:Presidents of the National Convention
title: Antoine Christophe Merlin
